title: Bloomberg Markets: Moffett Sees Heavy Lift for Sprint, T-Mobile
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Moffett Sees Heavy Lift for Sprint, T-Mobile
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Craig Moffett\u0010Senior Rsch Analyst/Founder\u0010MoffettNathanson \u0010Discussing T-Mobile, Sprint  in active talks in a stock-for-stock merger, though are still weeks away from an agreement.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
